data.text:
From the very first line that's drawn for a master planned community, to how assets are operated on an ongoing basis, we‚Äôre looking at building cities and communities of tomorrow. Our SVP of Sustainability Strategy, Gautami Palanki recently sat down with Michael Beckerman and CREtech Climate Cast to discuss the positive progress being made in the real estate industry. Check out the latest episode‚ÄîThe Howard Hughes Approach to Scaling Sustainability‚Äîto learn more about the opportunities that define us as a leader in the sustainability space. üîó https://lnkd.in/gPN7z-rb #HowardHughes #CRE #RealEstate #Sustainability #ClimateTech #CREtech #SustainableDevelopment #Innovation

We're thrilled to announce the arrival of six dynamic new retail and restaurant offerings in Bridgeland! Jonathan's The Rub, Sweet Paris Cr√™perie & Caf√©, Crust Pizza Co., Venetian Nail Spa, Teal Poppy, and Gelato & Co. will be joining our notable tenant roster. We are excited to welcome you to Village Green at Bridgeland Central.

Curious about how we're defying expectations in commercial real estate? CEO, David O'Reilly, shared his thoughts today on Bloomberg Intelligence Radio with host Paul Sweeney. Highlights include our strong 90% office occupancy, record home and land sales, and a nearly 35,000-acre landbank with a robust pipeline of future development. With a $3.6 billion market cap and strong revenue forecasts, we see considerable growth and value creation opportunities. Check out the full interview to dive deeper into our expansion in dynamic markets like Phoenix, Las Vegas, and Houston. üîó https://lnkd.in/g7c6d2M3 #HowardHughes #Bloomberg #RealEstate #CRE #Houston #Phoenix #LasVegas #RealEstateTrends

Alex joins us this year as a Summer Associate working with our Sustainability team. Born and raised here in The Woodlands, he recently graduated from Texas A&M University with a bachelor's degree in economics and plans to pursue a master's degree in land and property development. During his program, Alex has had a chance to give back to his community by volunteering with Montgomery County Food Bank, tour some of our communities in Greater Houston, and hear directly from our executives during an exclusive speaker series. "Being able to see all the growth and change that this company has brought to The Woodlands is incredible, and now to be a part of that change is something that I could never have imagined." -Alex G. Learn more üîó https://lnkd.in/gs4kC-C2 #howardhughes #lifeathh #internship #summerinternship #studentprograms

We are pleased to announce Bhupesh Arora as Chief Technology Officer at Howard Hughes. ‚ÄúI am excited to join Howard Hughes as the new CTO. Howard Hughes has a strong brand presence, a rich heritage of innovation, and a strategic mission of building inspired, award-winning communities. I look forward to working with the team to transform their digital capabilities and provide a superior customer experience." As a part of our executive leadership team, Mr. Arora brings extensive experience from previous roles at various Fortune 500 companies such as Avery Dennison, Hyundai Motor Company (ÌòÑÎåÄÏûêÎèôÏ∞®), Nissan Motor Corporation, and most recently Magellan Midstream Partners. His expertise in driving technology strategy, digital transformation, and large-scale implementations will be a tremendous asset to Howard Hughes. Lara joins us this year as a Summer Associate working with our Corporate Communications team. Originally from Brazil, she moved to Texas three years ago to pursue her education in PR & Communications at The University of Texas at Austin. During the program, Lara will gain early career exposure to the real estate industry and a corporate environment, face-to-face interactions with leaders, and hands-on project experience. "The orientation events, networking opportunities, and speaker series made me feel welcomed and excited to start collaborating." -Lara D.
